channel.title: Need Help Will Pay Of For All 100% (Please!)
channel.description:
[u]Before You Type Or Read Lets Get A Few Things Straight[/u]
1. Im not Lazy 2. Im Bored 3. Im Not a Noob 4. Im Not a leacher 5. i like to help people 6. i get stressed quite easily 7. i can give rewards 8. im a ***** coder (not a swear word, stars!!!)
Ok Lets Get Started [u] What I Am Doing And Want/Need Help With[/u]
1. im creating a server maker in a batch file (.bat) 2. i need someone or a group of people to turn estimated 500,000 lines to 1,000,000 lines into the following
Heres a few lines from client.java
[code]import java.io.*; import java.util.StringTokenizer; import java.util.Calendar; import java.util.GregorianCalendar; [/code]
i need EVERY line in everyone of my server files turned into this
[code] echo import java.io.*; > client.java echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; > client.java echo import java.util.Calendar; > client.java echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; > client.java [/code]
[size=20pt][u]WARNING READ[/u][/size] [size=10pt]CHANGE THE END BIT OF THE FILE EG. client.java TO WHATEVER THE FILE WAS YOU ADJUSTED (DOSENT REALLY MATTER IF YOU DIDNT JUST MORE WORK FOR ME) [/size] What This Does It Stops batch file operations thinking its a command and it saves the lines as client.java [size=20pt][u] Here Are The Files Please Post Once You Have Done It To The Files PLEASE DONT ADJUST ATALL[/u][/size]
Download Files Here
[url=http://mushroompk.com/server/]http://mushroompk.com/server/[/url]
[size=10pt]IT DOES LOOK STRANGE THE WEBSITE BUT ALL IT IS, IS A SUB DIRECTORY OF MY WEBSITE[/size]
When Reposting Here Type It Like This
[code][u](file name you editted)[/u] (link)*(UPPIT PREFFERED) [size=10pt]COMPLETED[/size][/code]
Please Dont Adjust files I hope to turn into a java app soon

item.title: Need Help Will Pay Of For All 100% (Please!)
item.dc:creator: @mushroompk_owner mushroompk owner
item.description:
@mushroompk_owner wrote:

Before You Type Or Read Lets Get A Few Things Straight

  1. Im not Lazy
  2. Im Bored
  3. Im Not a Noob
  4. Im Not a leacher
  5. i like to help people
  6. i get stressed quite easily
  7. i can give rewards
  8. im a ***** coder (not a swear word, stars!!!)

Ok Lets Get Started

What I Am Doing And Want/Need Help With

  1. im creating a server maker in a batch file (.bat)
  2. i need someone or a group of people to turn estimated 500,000 lines to 1,000,000 lines into the following

Heres a few lines from client.java

import java.io.*; import java.util.StringTokenizer; import java.util.Calendar; import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

i need EVERY line in everyone of my server files turned into this

echo import java.io.*;                                 > client.java
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer;           > client.java
echo import java.util.Calendar;                     > client.java
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar;       > client.java

[size=20pt]WARNING READ[/size]
[size=10pt]CHANGE THE END BIT OF THE FILE EG. client.java TO WHATEVER THE FILE WAS YOU ADJUSTED (DOSENT REALLY MATTER IF YOU DIDNT JUST MORE WORK FOR ME)
[/size]
What This Does It Stops batch file operations thinking its a command and it saves the lines as client.java
[size=20pt]
Here Are The Files Please Post Once You Have Done It To The Files PLEASE DONT ADJUST ATALL[/size]

Download Files Here

http://mushroompk.com/server/

[size=10pt]IT DOES LOOK STRANGE THE WEBSITE BUT ALL IT IS, IS A SUB DIRECTORY OF MY WEBSITE[/size]

When Reposting Here Type It Like This

[u](file name you editted)[/u] (link)*(UPPIT PREFFERED) [size=10pt]COMPLETED[/size]

Please Dont Adjust files I hope to turn into a java app soon

Read full topic
